text: As California communities recover from a devastating #wildfire season, we reflect on the generosity of donors that is helping them rebuild. Learn more about the impact of the #WildfireReliefFund in this week's #LATogether blog post. #ThomasFire https://latogether.org/2018/06/04/joining-together-for-wildfire-recovery/
From CDFA Secretary Karen Ross - After the #ThomasFire: growers inspire with resiliency, optimism http://plantingseedsblog.cdfa.ca.gov/wordpress/?p=14664 #avocados #agriculture
The #ThomasFire: 40 days of devastation via @latimes http://www.latimes.com/projects/la-me-thomas-fire-40-days-of-devastation-3d/

"The #ThomasFire, the largest fire in California history, burned vegetation and altered the ground surface in the Santa Ynez Mountains above Montecito. This allowed water and mud to flow swiftly down the San Ysidro Creek toward developed areas." https://www.washingtonpost.com/graphics/2018/national/montecito-before-after/?tid=ss_tw&utm_term=.3898ee7ac1fb

Want to know how you can help communities that have been impacted by wildfires? CCF is matching contributions to the Wildfire Relief Fund up to $100,000, and 100% of donations go to those affected. Learn more: http://www.calfund.org/wildfire-relief-fund/ #SoCalFires #NorCalFires #ThomasFire
12/7/17 #ThomasFire Day 4(11:51AM) Maricopa Hwy Crews from Cal Fire stage in Ojai. Follow the story: #thomastimeline

VIDEO Sneak Peak of the @WeAreFarmers #RoseParade float #HonoringHometownHeroes. #CalGuard Sgt. Anthony Orduno, a UH-60 Black Hawk crew chief who flew missions in support of the #ThomasFire, will join first responders from @CAL_FIRE, police, and other agencies on the float!

The #ThomasFire has become the largest wildfire in modern California history, surpassing the 2003 #CedarFire. Latest #ThomasFire info from @CAL_FIRE: - 1,063 structures destroyed - 280 structures damaged - 273,400 acres burned - 65% contained - $177m firefighting cost

From @CAL_FIRE: the #ThomasFire has now burned 273,400 acres. That makes it the largest wildfire modern in CA history. It’s 65% contained. The Cedar Fire in San Diego County burned 273,246 acres in 2003. @KNX1070

Want to know how you can help communities that have been impacted by wildfires? CCF is matching contributions to the Wildfire Relief Fund up to $100,000, and 100% of donations go to those affected. Learn more: http://www.calfund.org/wildfire-relief-fund/ #SoCalFires #NorCalFires #ThomasFire

Oh thank goodness! The past two weeks have been really stressful with the #ThomasFire. THANK YOU to all the Firefighters from @CAL_FIRE and the surrounding States for being real HEROES and pulling out all the stops to bring a Christmas Miracle to our community!
Here is tonight's #ThomasFire update from @CAL_FIRE #805Strong

#ThomasFire continues to grow as strong, shifting winds bring new dangers - via @latimes @melissaetehad @LATvives http://www.latimes.com/local/lanow/la-me-thomas-fire-ledeall-20171217-story.html #SantaBarbara
California's #ThomasFire now bigger than New York City
#ThomasFire map updated with latest evacuation zones for #santabarbara
Quick #ThomasFire update from @CAL_FIRE. Link to PDF at http://ow.ly/TfS730hgjVk #SantaBarbaraCounty #SantaBarbara
Even now as the sun begins to set, #MAFFS gets a call for support from @CAL_FIRE. Hoping to put a dent in containment of #ThomasFire. #KeepingCaliforniaSafe
Smoke and ash from the #ThomasFire linger thick in the Santa Ynez air, miles from the front lines of the blaze. (Photos by Donnie Hedden for Direct Relief)

As firefighters continue to battle California’s #ThomasFire — now the fourth-largest in state history — a group of scientists presented new results suggesting that air pollution from such massive blazes may be one of their deadliest consequences." https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/energy-environment/wp/2017/12/15/smoke-from-wildfires-may-be-surprisingly-deadly-scientists-report/?utm_term=.0c59780047d4
A #firefighter from Cal Fire/San Diego died battling the #ThomasFire this morning http://firehouse.com/12386897 #LODD

Cory Iverson, 32, killed today while battling the #ThomasFire, was a Fire Apparatus Engineer from @CAL_FIRE’s San Diego unit. Iverson is survived by his wife and two-year-old daughter; another daughter is due in the spring. Bless his family and his memory.
Firefighter killed while fighting #ThomasFire in Ventura Co identified as 32 year old Cory Iverson from Cal Fire San Diego. He leaves behind his pregnant wife and their 2-year-old daughter.
Engines from Cal Fire San Diego arriving. A procession is planned back to Ventura County Medical Examiners office for the firefighter who died today. #ThomasFire
#VCFD is devastated by the loss of a fellow firefighter from @CAL_FIRE San Diego unit assigned to #ThomasFire. Extending our prayers and condolences to our @CAL_FIRE family.
My heartfelt prayers go out to the fallen #hero #firefighter #battling the #ThomasFire from @CAL_FIRE #HosaiNasir #CaliforniaWildfires #NaturalDisaster #hope #faith #healing #loss #patience
Smoke Blankets Santa Barbara County, Not Everyone Can Evacuate @SBNC805 #ThomasFire https://n.pr/2CgUIIG via @NPR
An engineer from Cal Fire's San Diego unit has died while assisting with the #ThomasFire. Officials say they will release more information as soon as possible. http://bit.ly/2Bq7kQm

Very sad news from the front lines of the #ThomasFire An engineer #firefighter from @CAL_FIRE was killed while battling the fire. Our thoughts and prayers are with his loved ones and #fire family. #BrushFire #Ventura #SantaBarbara #cawildfires

Fire crews from near & far are responding to the 240k+ acre #ThomasFire burning in Ventura & Santa Barbara Counties in CA. Damage assessments for wildfires in the state are scheduled to start tomorrow to help determine if additional federal assistance may be needed. : @inciweb

N95 masks are being distributed free of charge to those residents and businesses impacted by the #ThomasFire. For a list of distribution sites in Ventura County, visit the following link: http://readyventuracounty.org/.
#ThomasFire UPDATE from @CAL_FIRE reports acreage as 238,500. @KSBY
Fire map shows distribution sites for N95 masks throughout Santa Barbara County. #ThomasFire https://directrelief.maps.arcgis.com/apps/StoryMapBasic/index.html?appid=cd4f90ca836244a9a4af09ec645c3857

For #ThomasFire resources such as mask distribution sites, evacuation information, & more, visit http://www.readyventuracounty.org (Ventura County) or http://countyofsb.org/thomasfire.sbc#update (Santa Barbara County).
Would your group like to send thank you/holiday cards to an inmate crew? PM me the email address. Will forward instructions from Cal Fire. #ThomasFire
"The #ThomasFire is one of six major wildfires torching Southern California. The fires have destroyed more than 1,000 structures since igniting."
Boy Scout Troop 41 of Solvang is distributing N95 masks from @DirectRelief to help residents filter out particulates and debris in the air. #ThomasFire
Distributing breathing masks to communities in Santa Ynez and Solvang, where air quality has been a concern for many. #ThomasFire

#ThomasFire The latest update from Cal Fire this morning says severe fire weather continues to threaten the communities of Santa Barbara, Carpinteria, Montecito and Summerland. Firefighters are currently focused on Toro and Romero Canyon above Summerland.
Delivering N-95 masks to residents in Ventura and Oxnard. #ThomasFire
This Post article covers up to yesterday and gives a great quote from CAL Fire on the status of Evacuations. #thomasfire
With #ThomasFire Unfolding, @DirectRelief Map Dynamically Updates Region
The inferno that won't die: How the Thomas fire became such a monster http://www.latimes.com/local/lanow/la-me-thomas-fire-explainer-20171211-htmlstory.html #ThomasFire

The Thomas Fire is now the fifth largest fire in modern California history, burning 230,500 acres since last Monday. Read more about the fire from CAL FIRE: http://cdfdata.fire.ca.gov/incidents/incidents_details_info?incident_id=1922 #ThomasFire
Cowboy rides to the rescue during Ventura County fires: http://plantingseedsblog.cdfa.ca.gov/wordpress/?p=14352 #ThomasFire #Horses #Rescue

Data from @Cal_Fire indicates that the #ThomasFire has destroyed 754 structures (plus damaged an additional 162). One-quarter of California's Top 20 most destructive wildfires on record have occurred in the last 70 days: 1) Tubbs 6) Nuns 10) Atlas 11) Thomas 17) Redwood Valley

Here’s how you can help the communities that have been impacted by the devastating fires burning across #SoCal: http://www.calfund.org/socalwildfire/ #ThomasFire #CreekFire #SkirballFire #RyeFire #LilacFire
Santa Barbara County coastal towns under siege as #ThomasFire grows http://www.latimes.com/local/lanow/la-me-thomas-fire-santa-barbara-fire-20171210-story.html @melissaetehad @latimes
Handing out free N-95 at two #Ojai locations: Beacon Coffee & @greatergoodsoj #ThomasFire
Handing out N-95 masks at Beacon Coffee and Greater Goods in Ojai today. #ThomasFire

"In response to all the soot, smoke, and ash belched forth by the #ThomasFire, a new fashion accessory has sprung up throughout Santa Barbara: the face mask." @Independent http://m.independent.com/news/2017/dec/08/unhealthy-air-quality-warnings-remain-effect/?templates=mobile
Handing out free N-95 masks at Mesa produce on cliff drive. Other locations include SB public library, Franklin community center, #Goleta Costco & #Carpinteria Albertson's. #ThomasFire
As Wildfires Burn, Residents Seek Breath of Fresh Air #ThomasFire
Handing out N-95 masks at the Vons shopping center in Montecito #ThomasFire
Ojai surrounded as fire pushes toward Carpinteria | @pacbiztimes https://shar.es/1Mehz3 #ThomasFire

Today President Trump signed an emergency declaration for the California wildfires. This provides federal emergency aid to supplement state, tribal and local response efforts for the #LilacFire, #SkirballFire, #ThomasFire, #CreekFire and #RyeFire.
Updated #ThomasFire mandatory evacuations from @CAL_FIRE. Much of Ojai Valley still impacted. Info was last updated Dec. 8 @7 a.m. (Screenshots from @CAL_FIRE Incident Update)

#ThomasFire After passing out 47,000 masks yesterday, @DirectRelief is handing out thousands more today at the following three locations: •Goleta (Camino Real, in front of Costco) •Santa Barbara (Franklin Neighborhood Center) •Carpinteria at City Hall/Albertson’s
Masks will be distributed again today 12/8 + fire map from Cal Fire last night. #ThomasFire #KCSB #UCSB
A farmer's perspective on soils from the fire zone: http://plantingseedsblog.cdfa.ca.gov/wordpress/?p=14345 #CASoilsWeek #agriculture #ThomasFire #SoCalFires
Newly updated #Thomasfire numbers from Cal Fire: 132,000 acres - 10% contained
47,000 N-95 masks distributed today to residents of Ventura, Santa Barbara & Goleta. More planned for tomorrow. #ThomasFire
#ThomasFire data overlaid with today’s Landsat 8 satellite imagery
#ThomasFire mask handout – at San Marcos High School
Distributing 3K N-95 masks at the Albertsons in Carpinteria. #ThomasFire

Santa Barbara and Goleta are registering the worst air quality in California, as the only cities in the state with air quality in the "very unhealthy" or "hazardous" range, according to the @EPA Air Quality Index. #ThomasFire #SoCalFires https://airnow.gov/index.cfm?action=aqibasics.aqi
RT @146AirliftWing: MAFFS4 and MAFFS6 preparing for another day on the #Thomasfire. We are standing by for when we get launch orders from @CAL_FIRE. @theCaGuard
Distributing much-needed N-95 masks at the Franklin Health Center in Santa Barbara. #ThomasFire
#ThomasFire – at Costco
#ThomasFire – at Franklin neighborhood community center Center
Handing out 4,000 N-95 masks at two SB locations this morning. Franklin Community Center & Goleta Costco. #ThomasFire

As Santa Ana winds continue to quickly spread the #ThomasFire north of Ojai & toward Santa Barbara County, please RT this updated evacuation and shelter map from Cal Fire. If you see fire approaching, evacuate immediately, don't wait to be told to leave.
MAFFS4 and MAFFS6 preparing for another day on the #Thomasfire. We are standing by for when we get launch orders from @CAL_FIRE. @theCaGuard
12/7/17: An update from @CAL_FIRE on the #ThomasFire

We approved a Fire Management Assistance Grant for the #SkirballFire to assist with the cost of emergency work in #CA. Learn more about the federal response to the #ThomasFire, #CreekFire, #RyeFire and #SkirballFire at http://fema.gov/disasters
Hwy 101, La Conchita #ThomasFire
#SoCalFires map of burn perimeter, wind speed & direction: https://directrelief.maps.arcgis.com/apps/StoryMapBasic/index.html?appid=cd4f90ca836244a9a4af09ec645c3857 #ThomasFire

Personal care packs and N-95 masks were delivered to an evacuation shelter in Ojai, California, where the #ThomasFire forced thousands from their homes.

If you're in an area affected by the #fires, get up-to-the-minute info on #evacuations, available #shelters & closures at http://readyventuracounty.org/ & updates from @RedCrossVentura. #ThomasFire #CreekFire #SkirballFire #RyeFire

Remember winds can spread the fire anywhere, I've seen fires jump freeways with a wind gust. Its critical to be prepared! Know what you cannot live without, its less than you think! Great tips from @CAL_FIRE #ThomasFire #SkirballFire

We approved Fire Management Assistance Grants for the #ThomasFire, #CreekFire, and #RyeFire to help cover the costs of emergency work in California. Listen to local officials and evacuate if instructed.
Here are the latest numbers from Cal Fire on the #ThomasFire. We're expecting an update this morning.

We approved a fire management grant for California to help firefighters battle the #ThomasFire.

RT @SenFeinstein: VENTURA COUNTY: #ThomasFire dangerous and rapidly growing. 31,000 acres burned and 150 structures destroyed. Please heed evacuation warnings and instructions from @Cal_Fire and emergency personnel. Stay safe! https://buff.ly/2iRYWSp
